meanings.definition: Call together for a meeting or assembly.
meanings.sent1: The teacher convokes the students for a class discussion.
meanings.sent2: The mayor convokes a town hall meeting to discuss community issues.
meanings.sent3: The cat convokes all the neighborhood pets for a secret meeting in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the bell convokes memories of school assemblies and childhood friends.
meanings.sent5: The loudspeaker convokes everyone to the main hall for an important announcement.

meanings.definition: Summon or gather people for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The coach convokes the team for a strategy session before the game.
meanings.sent2: The king convokes his advisors to plan the upcoming battle.
meanings.sent3: The magician convokes the audience to witness his amazing disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The music convokes memories of summer nights and dancing under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The emergency siren convokes residents to evacuate the area immediately.
